pages.text: 19|77|Anata wa waga shirushi o kyohi shita mono o mita ka. Daga kare wa,`watashi wa tomi to shison to ni, kitto megumarerudearou.' To iu.
19|78|Kare wa yūgen-kai o mi todoketa no ka. Soretomo jihibukai okata no nanrakano yakusoku o eta no ka.
19|79|Iya kesshite sōde wanai. Ware wa kare no iu koto o kiroku shi, kare ni taisuru chōbatsu o nobasudearou.
19|80|Kare-ra no itte iru koto wa subete ware ga hikitori, kare wa tadaichinin de waga moto ni kurudearou.
19|81|Kare-ra wa arrā no soto ni kamigami o tate, kare-ra o chūsai-sha ni shiyou to shite iru.
19|82|Kesshite sōde wanai. Kare-ra (kamigami) wa sono sūhai o kyohi shi, kare-ra ni taishi teki ni narou.
19|83|Kare-ra o sosonokasu tame ni, ware ga fushinjin-sha ni taishi akuma-tachi o noko wa shite iru no o anata wa kigatsukanai no ka.
19|84|Dakara kare-ra ni taishi seikyūdeatte wa naranai. Ware wa tadatada kare-ra no tame ni (kagira reta yūyo no hi)-sū o kazoeru dakedearu.
19|85|Sonohi, ware wa omo o osoreru mono o (meiyo no) shisetsu o mukaeru yō ni jihibukaki okata (no omoto) ni atsume,
19|86|ware wa tsumibukaimono o,-jū no gun o mizu ni ou yō ni, jigoku ni oitateru.
19|87|Jihibukaki okata kara o yurushi o eta mono no soto wa, dare mo torinasu chikara o motanaidearou.
19|88|Mata kare-ra wa iu. `Jihibukaki okata wa ko o mōke rareru.'
19|89|Tashikani anata gata wa, hidoi koto o iu monodearu.
19|90|Ten wa sakeyou to shi,-chi wa warete setsusetsu ni nari, yamayama wa kuzureochiyou.
19|91|Sore wa kare-ra ga, jihibukaki okata ni taishi,(ari mo shinai)-ko no na o (torinasu mono to shite) tonaeta tamedearu.
19|92|Ko o mōke rareru koto wa, jihibukaki okata ni wa arienai.
19|93|Ten to ji ni oite, jihibukaki okata no shimo be to shite, makari denai mono wa tada no 1-ri mo nai nodearu.
19|94|Hontōni kare wa, kare-ra no (subete) o keisan shi, kare-ra no kazu o kazoe rareru.
19|95|Mata shinpan no hi ni wa, kare-ra wa onōno hitori de kare no omoto ni makari deru.
